timeline.bodyText: Not part of this story, but we should add validation for createRequest to be sure we have cohort/conceptsets and values information in data set Request
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Isn't that what validateDataSetCreateRequest(dataSetRequest) on line 109 does?
replies.author: freemabd

timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Not sure return type of List needs to be Optional... it either has items on it or it's empty... no chance of a NullPointer
replies.author: freemabd

timeline.bodyText: Again we can create another story: But should this throw an exception if no data sets are found for resourceType and Id ?
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText:
